definition: to radiate/to shine/glitter of light/a glint

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

sentences.english: In a flash of gunpowder, a giant explodes onto the stage of history.
sentences.chinese: 在隆隆炮火的閃射中，歷史舞臺上出現了一個大人物。

sentences.english: Small breakers spring up, each breaker like a large eye casting out golden sparks .
sentences.chinese: 小波浪跳躍着，每一個象個大眼睛，閃射着金光。

sentences.english: Long streamers of Northern Lights flashing blue wisps across the sky.
sentences.chinese: 北極光的狹長流光，閃射出藍色的光芒，橫過夜空。
